data.title: Cisco Technologies – Advice from Experts – Clarity
data.text:
I am a management consultant and author of the Axiom award winning book "The Heretics Guide to Best Practices: The Reality of Managing Complex Problems in Organsiations". Started out life as an IT geek for the better part of fifteen years before moving into Information Architecture, Complex Problems Solving, Facilitation and Dialogue Mapping. Still have the geek side of my brain there, but have spent the last few years in many interesting projects in an organisational development and sensemaking role. Since 2007, I've been the owner of a consultancy called Seven Sigma (www.sevensigma.com.au) and the author of the Cleverworkarounds (www.cleverworkarounds.com) blog. Also a partner of Inovus (www.inovus.com.au) - a consultancy that combines some incredible skills into one place. I like to play piano, listen to heavy metal music and watch dumb movies :-)

Responsible for proof of concept designs for the Internet of Everything. Maximum Balance Foundation with the assistance of key partners referenced by California Department of Apprenticeship Standards (file # 29710) and DAS Form #7 signature participation, teaches students to analyze, test, troubleshoot, and evaluate existing network systems, such as local area network (LAN), wide area network (WAN), and Internet systems or a segment of a network system. Cisco Career Certifications and California Apprenticeship Certification We offer five levels of network certification: Entry, Associate, Professional, Expert and Architect, the highest level of accreditation within the Cisco Career Certification program. The program focuses on developing, prototyping and networking those products to the internet, and places a strong emphasis on growing the people and leaders behind the project in an effort to instill strong ethics, morals and a sense of responsibility to their community. As part of the main benefits of membership, we provide Funding Opportunities for select startup Members when their company is ready to raise a seed stage round of funding. In addition, CityLab, LLC. provides seed stage funding to specific Member and non-member companies that meet our investment criteria. We also provide introductions to angel investors and early stage VC firms from our investor network. I typically take a retainer of half of my overall fee in the following milestones schedule: Agreement Signed: $200 administrative fee. Contractor Commitment: $2000 Plans and Permitting Submitted: $3000

Contractor since 2006, teacher and trainer. I accompanied several major accounts in their IT infrastructure restructuring process. Beyond the customer's first idea, we start by redefining the real needs and objectives , vision of IT infrastructure evolution and impact on target solutions. We then define a compatible business constraints blueprint. I am also involved in monitoring the implementation of the master plan and project management . Between catchy presentations of major market players and the real needs of the customer, there is often a gap and useless investment or poorly routed . I can help you to see things from a different angle. Entrepreneur depuis 2006, professeur en école d'ingénieur et formateur. J'ai accompagné plusieurs grands comptes dans la démarche de restructuration de leurs infrastructures IT. Au delà de la première idée du client, nous commençons par redéfinir les véritables besoins et objectifs du client, sa vision de l'évolution de son infrastructure IT et les répercussions sur les solutions cibles. Nous définissions ensuite un schéma directeur compatible avec les contraintes métier et business. J'interviens également dans le suivi de la mise en place du schéma directeur et dans la gestion de projets. Entre les présentations accrocheuses des grands acteurs du marché et le besoin véritable du client, il y a souvent un gap et de l'investissement inutile ou mal aiguillé. Je peux vous aider à voir les choses sous un autre angle

Adeel Sheikh has been associated with UC / UCaaS / Managed Services industry for the last 17 years and has worked with the top leading vendors (Cisco, Microsoft, Zoom) and the likes of worlds leading Service Providers (AT&T, Verizon, BT, Vodafone, Telstra, NTT, Du, Etisalat etc) and multi nationals. His area of expertise is in Unified Communications, Cloud and Managed services. He is an expert in deriving cloud strategys and roadmap for SMB and enterprises. Adeels recent role is as a consultant who provides services to different customers for Cloud and UC transformation. Adeel Feroz Sheikh held the position of Solutions Architect - Cisco Cloud and Manged Services (CMS), while working at Cisco Systems, Inc.. Adeel worked in this capacity for 8 years (October 2012 - February 2021). Before this, Adeel held the position of Sr Network Consulting Engineer, while working at Cisco Systems, Inc.. Adeel occupied this position for 3 years (January 2010 - November 2012). Previously, Adeel held the position of Network Consulting Engineer, while working at Cisco Systems, Inc.. Adeel held this role for 2 years (October 2007 - February 2010). Before this, Adeel held the position of Network Consultant - Managed Voice Solutions, while working at Eupac. Adeel occupied this position for 10 months (December 2006 - October 2007). Previously, Adeel held the position of Network Consulting Engineer (VoIP), while working at Livewire International. Adeel held this role for 15 months (October 2005 - January 2007). Before this, Adeel held the position of Network Engineer and Lead Quality Assuarance, while working at Xper2go-Inc. Adeel occupied this position for 21 months (January 2004 - October 2005). Adeel completed an MS •Telecommunication and information systems degree from the University of Essex, in 2005 - 2006. Additionally, Adeel received a Bachelor's in Engineering (B.E) •Computer Systems Networking and Telecommunications degree, in 2000 - 2004, from NED University of Engineering and Technology. Working as a Solutions Architect for Cisco's Cloud and Managed Services (CMS). Over 15+ years of experience in Cloud, Managed and Hosted Services. Performing Pre-Sales and Post-Sales support for the CMS -Day-2 Business. Specializing in Cisco's Collaboration Portfolio (Voice, IM, Presence and Video), Cisco HCS, Collaboration as a Service (CaaS), Managed UC, Orchestration, Service Fulfillment and Customer On Boarding. Design, Architecture and Implementation expertise for Cisco's Hosted Collaboration Soultion (HCS) Experienced in leading multi million Large and complex deals with Service Providers and Multi national Enterprises. Responsible for looking into Managed Hosted Collaboration Solution (HCS), Managed UC and Collaboration as a Service (CaaS). Lead Architect for Service Fulfillment of the Cisco Operate and Cloud Collaboration portfolio. Responsible for designing and deploying Cisco's Hosted Collaboration Solution (HCS). Cisco HCS is a unique solution offering Service Providers to effectively deploy, manage and monitor their customers with zero touch automated Service assurance and Fulfillment Suite . This solution is based on visualized data center infrastructure and Cloud computing. Expertise in the following domains: Collaboration (UC) - Cloud, Managed and Hosted Datacenter and Virtualisation Tags: Cisco HCS, CaaS, UCaaS, Cisco Voice, CUCM, CUCDM, Pre Sales, Service Design. UCaaS MArket Strategy, RingCentral, VONC, Vodafone Unity, Middleware, Product Architect, Product Owner, SBC, Perimeta, Sonus, Ribbon, MS Teams. Direct Routing UCaaS Solutions Expertise: CIsco (HCS, WebEx, UCM Cloud), MS Team and Direct Routing Offer, Ring Central (Design and Integration for Service Providers), 8x8, Product Knowledge: Expertise in latest HCS Version (10.x 11.x 12.x and 14.x) - Hosted Collaboration Solution (HCS 10.x, 11,x) - UC on UCS - CUCDM 11.x - Both Deployment and Template Building - HCM-F 10.x Cisco Collaboration Suite - CUCM (12.x and 14.x) - Cisco Expressway - Jabber (10.X) - Cisco Unified Collaboration Suite 11.x (CUCM, CUPS, CUCxn), - Cisco SBC (CUBE-SP) - VMware Protocols: H323, SIP, MGCP, SCCP Design Expertise - Design (HLD, LLD, NRFU (Test Plans), Dialplan design) - Cloud Migration Documents - Product assessment and market capatalisation Pre-Sales Expertise: - RFP, SOW, Service Description
